shrimp.name: Bake
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Bakes the supplied data channel into a bakefile. In 3Delight's case, you can force the baked file to be in binary format, instead of ASCII format, by toggling the ascii parameter, which is enabled (ascii on) by default. Check your renderer's documentation, since this function is isn't available in all renderers.
